isb:document.isb:docowner: Bolouri Group, Institute for Systems Biology

isb:docsection.name: Introduction
isb:docsection.label: introduction
isb:docsection.p: The Bolouri Group is establishing a speaker rotation for the weekly group meetings. Each week an individual (or in some cases, a pair of group members) will give a brief presentation to the group, on a (scientifically relevant) topic of their choosing. If you are presenting a paper that you read, please consider sending around a reference to the paper (or the PDF) to the group in advance, so the group members can familiarize themselves with the paper in advance of your talk.

isb:docsection.name: Schedule
isb:docsection.label: schedule
isb:docsection.p:
The following table shows the schedule of weekly speakers for the Bolouri Group meetings:
2003/05/07 Stephen Ramsey 2003/05/14 Bill Longabaugh 2003/05/21 Pedro de Atauri and Daehee Hwang 2003/05/58 Alistair Rust 2003/06/04 David Orrell 2003/06/11 Larissa Kamenkovich 2003/06/18 Kostas Lycostratis
